Package game

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Boss
    enemy class --boss--
    Coin
    coin class, used as a collectible
    CoinCollision
    collison listener for Coin class, increments the coinCount and plays a sound every time a coin is collected
    Controller
    player is controllable by keyboard, the view must stay on the JFrame, otherwise the key controls will not work
    ControlPanel
    all gui elements are implemented here through Game.java
    Enemy
    enemy class
    Game  
    GameLevel  
    GameSaverLoader
    Creating a game save and loader
    Gate
    gate class that will allow the player to transition to the next level with a collision
    GiveFocus  
    Heart
    heart class, used as a collectible that gives more health in a level
    Level1
    creating the first level of the game
    Level2
    second level in the game
    Level3  
    Level4  
    LevelCollision
    allows the player to transistion to the next level with a collision
    LifeCollision
    collision class for when an enemy and player collide
    Meteor  
    MouseHandler
    created a mousehandler that allows the player to shoot.
    MovingPlatform
    creates a 'moving' platform using a step listener
    MovingPlatformDown
    creates a 'moving' platform using a step listener
    MovingPlatformSide
    creates a 'moving' platform using a step listener
    MyView  
    Person
    class for the players character
    PolygonEditor
    Very basic polygon editor.
    Shoot
    shoot class for the player
    ShootCollision
    collision class for most body collisions in the game
    Slime
    enemy class that moves with a step listener
    Spike
    static body that uses a collision listener later on
    Tracker
